title: Fantastic newly renovated fully furnished 2-room apartment
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Minimum rental period 6 months. Suitable for 1-2 persons.

60 sqm apartment is ready to move in! It includes everything one needs. Anmeldung possible. Central but quiet location.
2nd floor of a Wilhelminian style house. Balcony with sitting area / Spacious living room with  comfortable corner sofa, large dining table, and smart TV / BR with fold-down bed (160x200) , large wardrobe, and smart TV / Fully equipped kitchen with comfortable seating area:  induction cooker, oven, fridge-freezer, integrated dishwasher, integrated washing machine, microwave, toaste  / Modern small bathroom with large walk-in shower / Small cellar compartment / Bicycle racks in the courtyard to lock your bike.

Berlin-Steglitz is a popular “bourgeois” district with lots of trees and greenery characterized by upscale Gründerzeit buildings, smaller villas, terraced houses and condominiums. The popular Schlossstraße shopping mile can be reached in only few minutes on foot and is perfect for strolling and shopping! Nice little restaurants, cafes and bars have established themselves here and relaxing leisure activities are within walking distance. 

Excellent connection to public transport with buses and subways (Breitenbachplatz U3,  Schlossstr. U9). From Schlossstr it is 9 minutes by subway to Kurfürstendamm (City West), 23 minutes to the main train station (“Hauptbahnhof) and 26 minutes to Friedrichstrasse (City East). S-Bahn S1 is 10 minutes on foot. 

The total rent includes the operating and heating costs, furnishing, electricity and internet. Rental deposit 2000,- Euros.
